mapper.insert: insert into mkt_campaign (MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, TIGGER_TYPE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE, MANAGE_TYPE, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, MKT_ACTIVITY_TARGET, MKT_CAMPAIGN_DESC, CALC_DISPLAY,ISALE_DISPLAY, EXEC_TYPE, EXEC_INVL, EXEC_NUM, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID, CREATE_CHANNEL, DIRECTORY_ID, CAM_LEVEL,IS_CHECK_RULE, SRC_TYPE, SRC_ID, SERVICE_CANCLE_FLAG, REGION_ID, LIFE_STAGE, SERVICE_TYPE, EXT_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EXEC_INIT_TIME) values (#{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tiggerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktCampaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planBeginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{planEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{mktCampaignType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktCampaignCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktActivityNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktActivityTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mktCampaignDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calcDisplay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isaleDisplay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{execType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{execInvl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{execNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{camLevel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isCheckRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceCancleFlag,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lifeStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extMktCampaignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{execInitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update: update mkt_campaign set TIGGER_TYPE = #{tiggerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME = #{mktCampaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME = #{planBeginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, PLAN_END_TIME = #{planEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=DATE}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE = #{mktCampaignType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_TYPE = #{mktCampaignCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR = #{mktActivityNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MKT_ACTIVITY_TARGET = #{mktActivityTarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MKT_CAMPAIGN_DESC = #{mktCampaignDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CALC_DISPLAY = #{calcDisplay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ISALE_DISPLAY = #{isaleDisplay,jdbcType=BIGINT}, EXEC_TYPE = #{execType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXEC_INVL = #{execInvl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXEC_NUM = #{execNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_CHANNEL = #{createChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIRECTORY_ID = #{directoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAN_ID = #{lanId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAM_LEVEL = #{camLevel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_CHECK_RULE = #{isCheckRule,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_ID #{srcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_TYPE = #{srcType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_CANCLE_FLAG = #{serviceCancleFlag,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LIFE_STAGE = #{lifeStage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVICE_TYPE = #{serviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXT_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{extMktCampaignId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXEC_INIT_TIME = #{execInitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, TIGGER_TYPE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE, MANAGE_TYPE, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, MKT_ACTIVITY_TARGET, MKT_CAMPAIGN_DESC, CALC_DISPLAY, ISALE_DISPLAY, EXEC_TYPE, EXEC_INVL, EXEC_NUM, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID, CREATE_CHANNEL, DIRECTORY_ID, CAM_LEVEL, IS_CHECK_RULE, SRC_ID, SRC_TYPE, SERVICE_CANCLE_FLAG, REGION_ID, LIFE_STAGE, SERVICE_TYPE, EXT_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID,EXEC_INIT_TIME from mkt_campaign where MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, TIGGER_TYPE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE, MANAGE_TYPE, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, MKT_ACTIVITY_TARGET, MKT_CAMPAIGN_DESC, CALC_DISPLAY, ISALE_DISPLAY, EXEC_TYPE, EXEC_INVL, EXEC_NUM, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID, CREATE_CHANNEL, DIRECTORY_ID, CAM_LEVEL, IS_CHECK_RULE, SRC_ID, SRC_TYPE, SERVICE_CANCLE_FLAG, REGION_ID, LIFE_STAGE, SERVICE_TYPE, EXT_MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID,EXEC_INIT_TIME from mkt_campaign order by UPDATE_DATE desc

select MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, TIGGER_TYPE, MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, PLAN_END_TIME, MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE, MANAGE_TYPE, MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR, STATUS_CD, LAN_ID, CREATE_CHANNEL, CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_DATE,CREATE_STAFF from mkt_campaign where 1 = 1
AND MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{map.mktCampaignName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (STATUS_CD = 2002 or STATUS_CD = 2003)
AND STATUS_CD != 2002 and STATUS_CD != 2003 AND STATUS_CD != 2005
AND STATUS_CD = 2005
AND TIGGER_TYPE = #{map.tiggerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND MKT_CAMPAIGN_TYPE = #{map.mktCampaignType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND MANAGE_TYPE = #{map.mktCampaignCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND MKT_ACTIVITY_NBR like CONCAT('%',#{map.activityNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND CREATE_CHANNEL like CONCAT('%',#{map.channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND STATUS_CD != 2001 order by UPDATE_DATE desc

select cam.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, cam.TIGGER_TYPE, cam.MKT_CAMPAIGN_NAME, cam.PLAN_BEGIN_TIME, cam.PLAN_END_TIME from mkt_campaign cam left join mkt_cam_strategy_conf_rel csrel on csrel.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = cam.MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID left join mkt_strategy_conf_rule_rel srrel on srrel.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_ID = csrel.STRATEGY_CONF_ID where srrel.MKT_STRATEGY_CONF_RULE_ID = #{ruleId}
